item.description:
Anoho Noodle House is an Asian style restaurant offering a wide selection of Chinese, Vietnamese and Japanese dishes,Singapore curry, shrimp and rice, beef noodle soup, lo mein, chow fun, fried pork dumplings, Szechuan chicken, Japanese pork chop soup and cold noodles. It also serves red and white wines, beers and sake.

The dishes we love the best served with love and care are being enjoyed by folks in the area. Noodle houses which are very popular on the West coast, are starting to pop up here in the east. We are so lucky to have one right here. So come on out and give it a try. Check out the menu...

http://www.anoho.com/menu.html

Oh yeah, try the bubble tea for the fun of it!!!

!
item.how_to_find_us: Look, or ask, for Colleen or Terri...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: For The Noodle Lovers...ANOHO NOODLE HOUSE in Middletown!
